title: Amazing Facts About Cardamom – Emperor Spices Cardamom
description: Cardamom is one of the world’s most exotic spices - alongwith Saffron and Vanilla. Cardamom belongs to the same botanical family as ginger and turmeric. Cardamom is also one of the world’s oldest spices – cultivated for more than 4000 years. It was popular in the ancient civilisations of Rome, Egypt and Greece.
